title: This activity tests you on how to iterate array object with array length, by using different loops in Java.

questionText.text:
Given n>=0, create an array length n*n with the following pattern, shown here for n=3 : 
{0, 0, 1,    0, 2, 1,    3, 2, 1}
(spaces added to show the 3 groups).
squareUp(3) → [0, 0, 1, 0, 2, 1, 3, 2, 1]
squareUp(2) → [0, 1, 2, 1]
squareUp(4) → [0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 2, 1, 0, 3, 2, 1, 4, 3, 2, 1]
Check your program against test cases below as a zip file. Submit your solution(zip file) when all test cases are passed
